ygData.subject: Re: Jboots??
ygData.msgSnippet: Fairly hard quest and you re not going to want to do it as a druid. Jboots are essentially permenant SoW affect. Now if you re worried about your sow
ygData.messageBody:
Fairly hard quest and you're not going to want to
do it as a druid.<br><br>Jboots are essentially
permenant SoW affect. Now if you're worried about your sow
dropping at wrong times-- then you might want to do the
quest. It's a lot of work-- I'd look it up and
see.<br><br>But as a druid, I sincerely doubt you'd want to.
Melee'rs desire it greatly though.. heheh. Forget, there's
also a Tboot or something like that. A purchased item
that I believe is an upgrade to jboots. I wish I could
remember exactly what it was. Anyone want to jump in here
and remind me?<br><br>shooman out
